description:
Transact-SQL is an essential skill for database professionals and developers working with SQL databases. This course takes you from your first SELECT statement to implementing transactional programmatic logic through a combination of expert instruction, demonstrations, and practical labs.
 
The course consists of multiple modules, each exploring a key area of the Transact-SQL language, with a focus on querying and modifying data in Microsoft SQL Server or Azure SQL Database. The labs are based on a sample database that you can deploy easily in Azure SQL Database, enabling you to get hands-on experience with Transact-SQL without any need to install and configure a database server. Create Transact-SQL SELECT Queries
	Work with Data types and NULLs
	Query Multiple Tables with Joins
	Use Set Operators
	Use Functions and Aggregate Data
	Use Subqueries and APPLY
	Use Table Expressions
	Group Sets and Pivot Data
	Modify Data
	Program with Transact-SQL
	Implement Error Handling and Transactions
requirements: Basic understanding of databases and IT systems.
